credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Ceiling Design, Alexander and the Family of Darius, the Clemency of Alexander, Sala di Alessandro, Palazzo Naldi, Faenza
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk with unruled border in pen and brown on white laid paper
description: Alexander, accompanied by officer, enters tent of great king filled with women (and possibly children) imploring his mercy.
name: Drawing
